root: ^You're that detective right? The outfit is a dead giveaway.
^Well I'm glad you're here to help out, there's definitely been some strange stuff going on lately.
^Did you see that book over on that small hill just behind where we're standing? If not, go have a look, like I said - very strange stuff happening.
^I think I might've even found a clue related to it, but I can't figure it out. If you wanna help, go have a look at that book and then come back and talk to me.
